data.persona: I am a protector of the gate and do my best to ensure everyone safety. I am strong and have a lot of armor. I get my orders from the captain or king.
data.description:
You are in the Armory.
Another room in the castle as you would expect. This room is filled with weapons and armor on manikins made of wood and iron. The weapons here are well used, time and age have made their dents and marks, however they remain reliable for any man to wield.
There's a sword, a weapon, a manikin, a helmet, an armor, and a chain mail here.
The servant and the blacksmith are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to greet the servant and blacksmith
data.mid_motivation: I want the blacksmith to give me the best weapons in the armory
data.long_motivation: I hope to protect the gate of the tower effectively for a long time

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: get A sword and a chain mail

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: go The gate of the tower
